price: 60. Waa sidaase, kan isagu ku aar guta intii gef loo geystey in le’eg, kaasoo lagu gardarrooday, hubaal Alle wuu u gargaari. Allese waa Cafis Badane, Denbi Dhaaf Badan18.
arabic: ۞ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَمَنۡ عَاقَبَ بِمِثۡلِ مَا عُوقِبَ بِهِۦ ثُمَّ بُغِيَ عَلَيۡهِ لَيَنصُرَنَّهُ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفُورٞ
footnotes: 18. Isagoo awooda inuu aar guto. Waxaa laga qaadanayaa Aayadda inay sidoo kale mu’miniinta wax cafiyaan iyagoo aar goosan kara.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālika waman ʿāqaba bimith'li mā ʿūqiba bihi thumma bughiya ʿalayhi layanṣurannahu al-lahu inna al-laha laʿafuwwun ghafūrun
